text.value:
PREDATOR/NEONATE SETUP INSTRUCTIONS:
  1. Sturdy tree within 2000 m of navigation point
  2. Jeep/ATV/closed-road > hiking trail > well-used game trail
  3. Optimal height: ~3 m high, depends on situation
  4. Optimal distance: 11 m from trail, 8 m from edge of road (min 5 m, max 20)
  5. Perpendicular to trail
  6. Angled so trail is in bottom ½ -⅓ of image
  7. Similar surrounding habitat as ungulate cam (EOE paired cameras only)
  8. WALK TEST
  9. REFERENCE-ITEM PHOTO at NEAR EDGE of trail/road
  10. Placard photo with CAM ID and SITE Number
*No flagging necessary (only ungulate cams)

UNGULATE SETUP INSTRUCTIONS:
  1. Go to Navigation Point
  2. Determine habitat comp of 10 m Reference Area
  3. Select tree (or T-post location) within 30 m of Navigation Point where camera will point toward habitat similar to Reference Area
  4. Clear vegetation, tree limbs and nearby shrubs
  5. Position camera, pointing in any direction, about 2 m high (elk eye level)
  6. Aim parallel to topography
  7. DISTANCE-REFERENCE flagging along center line
  8. REFERENCE-ITEM PHOTO at 10 m
  9. Placard photo with CAM ID & SITE Number
*NO WALK TEST (only predator cams)

bind.calculate: if(selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/project ,'SWUNG2020') or selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/eoe_style , 'ung'), "ungulate",if(selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/project ,'SWWLF2020') or selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/project ,'CAMLN2020') or selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/eoe_style , 'neo_pred'), "predator",""))

if(selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/wolf_type ,'wolf_a'),concat("A_", /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/cam_info/cellid_number ),if(selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/wolf_type ,'wolf_o'), concat("O_", /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/cam_info/cellid_number ), if(selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/wolf_type ,'wolf_b'), concat("B_", /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/cam_info/cellid_number ),if(selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/project ,'CAMLN2020'), /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/cam_info/cellid_number , if(selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/project ,'SWUNG2020'), concat("R", /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/cam_info/region ,"_", /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/cam_info/rsf ,"_", /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/cam_info/cellid_number ),if(selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/eoe_style ,'neo_pred'),concat("P_", /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/cam_info/cellid_number ),if(selected( /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/eoe_style ,'ung'),concat("U_", /IDFGCamDeployment_2020/deploy_info/cam_info/cellid_number ), "")))))))

bind.jr:requiredMsg: Please select Python Lock(s) Key Number
Please measure Camera Height off Ground
Please record Type of Marker Left
Please record Type of Marker Center
Please record Type of Marker Right
Please measure Distance to Road/Trail Center
Please measure Width of Walk Test
Please measure Depth of Walk Test
Please identify what the camera is facing
Please select value for Canopy Cover

select1.label: Camera Project
select1.hint: If you do not see your project in the list, please select a different survey

input.label: Photo Batch
input.hint: If this is the first deployment, Photo Batch = 1. If you're swapping out an SD card or re-deploying a camera as part of an existing deployment, add 1 to previous Photo Batch.

input.label:
SETUP INSTRUCTIONS:
  1. Same location as previous year
  2. Optimal height: ~3 m high, depends on situation
  3. Perpendicular to trail
  4. Angled so trail is in bottom ½ -⅓ of image
  5. WALK TEST
  6. Placard photo with CAM ID and CELL ID
*No flagging necessary
Camera ID
input.hint: 4 digits from IDFG label ("IDFGxxxx") inside camera

input.label: Geographic Coordinates (decimal degrees, WGS84)
input.hint: Device will automatically grab coordinates of <u>current</u> location. Please verify coordinates using handheld GPS device, and manually change if necessary

input.label: Do not move while fixing location!
GPS Accuracy (m)
input.hint: If you change the latitude and longitude based on external handheld GPS reading, leave GPS Accuracy field <u>blank</u>

input.label: Coordinates are not in expected range (latitude 30º to 60º, longitude -120º to -90º). Are they in WGS84 decimal degrees?
<font color="red">Please record latitude and longitude to at least 5 decimal places</font>
Notes on navigation to site
input.hint: (i.e., roads and trails used with distances)

input.label: Distance to NEAR EDGE of road/trail (m)
Distance to FAR EDGE of road/trail (m)

upload.label: Camera Location Diagram (optional)
upload.hint: In the space below, draw a picture of the camera location, including the camera detection zone. Include any prominent boulders, stumps, or other objects that will aid finding the camera during retrieval. Include a north/directional arrow.

input.label:
1. Check SD card for viewshed & flagging (ungulate cams only), reference item, and placard photos
  2. Arm and set delay start to 2020-05-20
  3. Lock up camera

1. Check SD card for viewshed and placard photos
  2. Arm and set delay start to 2020-07-01
  3. Lock up camera

1. Check SD card for viewshed & flagging (if relevant), reference item, and placard photos
  2. Arm and set delay start (if relevant)
  3. Lock up camera

Ready to submit?

Tap checkmark in bottom right
